Curve_Points3D Property

CDXML Name:CurvePoints3D
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Curve_Points3D
CDX Constant Value:0x0A2E
Data Size:CDXCurvePoints3D
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Curve
First written/read in:ChemDraw 8.0
Required?No

Description:

The Bézier curve's control point locations in 3D space.
